long_description: You can't always count on weather to be perfect. That's why the Ibex Tuck jacket has a water-repellent polyester exterior and a warm merino wool lining for high performance in three-season conditions. Climawool fabric combines a stretchy polyester exterior with a 100% merino wool lining for weather protection and warmth. Durable Water Repellent finish on the exterior fends off light rain showers and snow. Zippered handwarmer pockets and zippered chest pocket; adjustable hem and cordlock system. Machine washable. The Ibex Tuck jacket has a semifitted cut. Closeout.
short_description: You can't always count on weather to be perfect. That's why the Ibex Tuck jacket has a water-repellent polyester exterior and a warm merino wool lining for high performance in three-season conditions.
